<!-- Data, methodology, results -->
<h3 class="header" style="padding-left:10px;background-color:#3b73a27d;">  
Data & Results
</h3>

<div class="content" style="padding:10px">
<p>
While this website provides an overview of the BHI process and framework, the two dashboards linked below provide information specific to different 'versions' of the Index. These [dashboards built with shiny](https://shiny.rstudio.com/) provide in-depth details on quantitative methodology, underlying data, and associated results. 

The [Baltic Health Index | Dashboard]() contains the most recent version of the Index, incorporating ongoing improvements to methodology and underlying data with successive assessments. The [Archived Dashboard | 2020 Paper Supplement]() is maintained as the supplement to our [paper](https://doi.org/10.1002/pan3.10178).

Note that because of changes, scores from different versions cannot be combined and utilized in time-series analysis.

</p>
</div>
